Production Co: Regency Enterprises, 20th Century Fox, New Regency Pictures
Rating: PG-13 (Language|Crude and Sexual Humor|Some Comic Violence)
Synopsis: Four adult orphans (Kal Penn, Adam Campbell, Faune Chambers, Jayma Mays) have an incredible adventure in a spoof of blockbuster and fantasy films. They visit a bizarre confectioner's chocolate factory and enter a mythic realm in which they must help a wise but lusty lion rid the land of a witchy woman.
Title: Epic Movie
